title: NFL teams - number of Facebook fans 2019
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Facebook fans in millions for 32 number of Teams.
Team Dallas Cowboys has the highest Facebook fans in millions and Jacksonville Jaguars has the lowest Facebook fans in millions.
There is a difference of 7.95 between the maximum Team Dallas Cowboys and minimum Team Jacksonville Jaguars.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Facebook fans in millions for 32 number of Teams.
The Facebook fans in millions is highest at Team Dallas Cowboys and lowest at Team Jacksonville Jaguars.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Facebook fans in millions for 32 number of Teams.
Team Dallas Cowboys has the highest Facebook fans in millions and Jacksonville Jaguars has the lowest Facebook fans in millions.
There is a difference of 7.95 between the maximum Team Dallas Cowboys and minimum Team Jacksonville Jaguars.
max_summary: This bar chart has 32 columns on the x axis representing Team, and Facebook fans in millions in each Team on the y axis.
The Facebook fans in millions is appeared to be the highest at Team Dallas Cowboys and lowest at Team Jacksonville Jaguars.
The highest Team Dallas Cowboys has 7.95 more Facebook fans in millions than the lowest Team Jacksonville Jaguars.
Facebook fans in millions at Team Dallas Cowboys is 8.58 , second place is New England Patriots at 7.07, and thirdly is Pittsburgh Steelers at 6.38.
Considered together, the average Facebook fans in millions in all 32 Teams is roughly 2.83.
Summing up the values of all Teams, we get total 90.46.
